concept.title: Working in the Commands Tab
concept.shortdesc: Perform actions using the Commands Tab.

conbody.p: Working directly in the Graph using the "drag and drop" technique involves fewer steps. However, working from the Commands Tab has multiple benefits.

ul.li: Certain commands, like Label and Hide, cannot be executed manually. The Commands Tab gives users access to the full range of tools.

Users also have more control over how those tools are implemented. For example, when Working manually, only a single node or node cluster can be manipulated at a given time. In the Commands Tab, users have the option to filter nodes by type.
